title: Training A-Train
description: A story about a hero… and the boy he taught to run. The previously unreleased film about Richard Brinkerhoff guiding A-Train to superhero stardom.
altHero: Brinkerhoff with his arm on A-Train’s back in front of a stadium of fans and lights
alt1: A-Train meeting a friend for a drug deal
alt2: Will Ferrell as Brinkerhoff holding a stop watch
alt4: an emtional hug between Brinkerhoff and A-Train
